permissions: User must be authorized for the related project transport plan (delegated via the project transport plan; access is based on project access or being an active driver on the plan).

flags.name: --project-transport-plan
flags.description: Filter by project transport plan ID (example: 123).

flags.name: --project-transport-event-type
flags.description: Filter by project transport event type ID (example: 456).

flags.name: --project-transport-location
flags.description: Filter by project transport location ID.

flags.name: --project-transport-plan-stop
flags.description: Filter by project transport plan stop ID.

flags.name: --external-tms-event-id
flags.description: Filter by external TMS event ID.

flags.name: --project-transport-organization-id
flags.description: Filter by project transport organization ID (via location).

flags.name: --project-transport-organization
flags.description: Filter by project transport organization ID (example: 789).

flags.name: --project-material-type
flags.description: Filter by project material type ID.
